title: WTB: T206 Chase Pink or Carlos Smith BLAZERS
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Chase Pink or Carlos Smith BLAZERS
posts.post_content:
Have a Chase Pink or Carlos Smith SL'er you want to sell? I'm looking for a bright white, perfectly registered, example with great centering and sharp corners.

Not too concerned with the back or grade, as long as the front is flawless.

Thanks! :)

...or a McIntyre portrait even.

Basically looking for a real nice pink portrait.

Bump.

How about a real nice Bender portrait EX or below?
How about any super sharp T206 at all?!?! :)
